title: The Prophet
description: After a three year search for a serial killer known as The Prophet, FBI agents Sean Sebastian and Rheta Morgan; both who have a personal reason to stop him, finally get a break and The Prophet is within their reach. Confrontation leads them to discover a secret network called the New Brotherhood and the more they find out about the New Brotherhood, the more determined they are to stop it.When The Prophet takes Rheta and Sean's sister hostage, the race is on to free them and bring down the Brotherhood.
author: K.J. Dahlen
